attributes.action: More funding for special educational needs in schools
attributes.additional_details: The lack of support within schools for children with special educational needs is a national crisis and requires action today! More and more children are lacking the correct support that they require to thrive. Every child deserves the right to an education that meets their needs. The government needs to act on this and to help these children who are being let down by the educational system.
attributes.background: Provide more funding for extra support, to children with special educational needs within mainstream schools

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637624
